question: So my tongue has been coated with white thrush and has turned black , although it is not as bad as it was last week but this been going on for 2.5 - 3 wks now and not sure what it is.I have also had some lip and tongue blisters, craters, geographic tongue, and popliteal pronounced with stomach pain on and off.  Not sure what is going on, I tested negative for HIV i haven't been tested for diabetes yet but hope its not that.THank you
title: Oral Thrush (black coated tongue)
